org.xbib.marc.io

Class PatternInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • java.io.BufferedInputStream
          • org.xbib.marc.io.PatternInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, ChunkStream<byte[],BytesReference>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlephSequentialInputStream, BiblioMondoInputStream, MabDisketteInputStream, PicaInputStream, PicaPlainInputStream, SisisInputStream

    public class PatternInputStream
extends java.io.BufferedInputStream
    A buffered input stream that is organized in chunks separated by byte array patterns. Convenience implements are give by PatternInputStream.lf() for line-feed separated streams, and PatternInputStream.CRLF for carriage-rturn/line-feed separated streams.
